answers.answer: Congrats! Praying everything goes well for you this pregnancy.

Congrats!! Glad that youve joined our forum :) there are lots of wonderful people on here. And its great to not feel "alone" with all the symptoms and such going on. If you have any questions or doubts as away :) Im due with my 7th <~ yes thats right its not a typo lol on Nov. 6 Lord willing :) Hope you enjoy the forum!!
Congrats and hope all gose well for u and the baby!
Hello this is also my 3rd n im due 26th nov;  do u av boys or girls or 1 of each
Thanks everyone! I have a boy and a girl plus a stepson! You? ;-)
I yoo wm hoping to deliver early..my first wss 4 weeks & second 7..so hoping not too early but maybe before my birthday!
I'm due the same day with baby #2!  :)First born is a girl,  this one's going to be a boy!
Congrats mommy...I'm also due Nov 26th with a baby girl ...can't wait
Nov 26th is my birthday! :) im due november 20th with a babyboy! Hoping he'll stay in until my birthday :)

question: Hello everyone, happy to find this forum. Its helpful to read what other mamas are feeling & knowing many have the same questions or concerns is very comforting!This is our 3rd and although quite a suprise..we're excited and nervous. Our youngest (whose 10) was 7 weeks preemie due to severe HELLP/GD..and the diabetes has returned this time prior to pregnancy. Wish us luck<3All my best thoughts for all you!
title: New to thr forum Due 11/26/13
